name: Help!~ The Castle's On Fire!
description:
A platformer made for the GDS Game Jam 22T3

Theme: Touching Grass 

Follow Iris, the lonely soul that traverses through the (mostly) abandoned castle, wandering whilst setting everything aflame!

Controls/How To Play:

Arrow keys - Move horizontally/vertically

Z key - Charge to jump

Esc key - Quit

IF YOU FIND YOURSELF GETTING STUCK, REMEMBER TO HOLD DOWN UP/DOWN AND THE DIRECTION YOU WANT TO JUMP (JUST BECAUSE OF THE BUGGY COLLISIONS), OR FALL OFF AND RETRY

Plants:

Bristlegrass - Iris' safe haven. She can keep her flame alight with it's flakey grass blades, away from the cold castle tiles.

Puffball Mushrooms - A buoyant, resiliant mushroom that propels Iris when landing on it, allowing her to reach greater heights.

Verbena Flowers - A mystical plant that acts as a wormhole when Iris burns it, sucking her through it's roots and spitting her out at it's petals and spores.

Cheats (if you want to mess around) (may break game due to unintended things happening):

Press 0 to activate debug/cheats and FPS counter, then use the 1, 2, 3, 4 keys to select the level you want to play

PS. NO MUSIC IN THE GAME BECAUSE I WAS TOO TIRED (AND IRL STUFF HAPPENING DURING THE JAM BUT ENJOY ANYWAYS :) )
